images.prompt: Realistic photograph with composition and atmosphere similar to a reference photo, but with different location, background, and environmental details. Maintain main context but create a different scene. Style: realistic photography, natural lighting, natural colors, real textures, camera depth of field. Must look like a real photograph taken by a human, NOT illustration, NOT cartoon, NOT vector, NOT painting, NOT AI-generated. No text, no watermark. Context: sarana, produksi, pertanian, ###, definisi. Theme: Indonesian agriculture, farming, agricultural products. Educational, natural, authentic style. No promotional aesthetics.
